article_title: Assessing the LG Health-Penn Medicine deal's potential impact on competition
article_text: More in Lancaster General Health Merger With the University of Pennsylvania Health System: Everything You Need to Know (11 of 29)

article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: Leaders of other local health systems won’t comment directly on the competitive implications of the proposed Lancaster General Health deal with Philadelphia-based Penn Medicine.
